00021     public abstract class ProjectItem
00022     {
00023         protected string name;
00024         protected int id;
00025         protected string description;
00026         protected DateTime startDate;
00027         protected DateTime expEndDate;
00028         protected DateTime actEndDate;
00029 
00030         #region Constructors
00034         internal ProjectItem(int id, string name, string description, 
00035             DateTime startDate, DateTime expEndDate, DateTime actEndDate)
00036         {
00037             this.id = id;
00038             this.name = name;
00039             this.description = description;
00040             this.startDate  = startDate;
00041             this.expEndDate = expEndDate;
00042             this.actEndDate = actEndDate;
00043         }
00044 
00048         internal ProjectItem()
00049             : this(0, "", "", DateTime.MinValue, DateTime.MinValue, DateTime.MinValue) {}
00050         #endregion
00051  
00052         #region Properties
00053         public int ID
00054         {
00055             get {   return id;  }
00056             set {   id = value; }
00057         }
00058         public string Name
00059         {
00060             get {   return name;    }
00061             set {   name = value;   }
00062         }
00063         public string Description
00064         {
00065             get {   return description;     }
00066             set {   description = value;    }
00067         }
00068         public DateTime StartDate
00069         {
00070             get {   return startDate;   }
00071             set {   startDate = value;  }
00072         }
00073         public DateTime ExpEndDate
00074         {
00075             get {   return expEndDate;  }
00076             set {   expEndDate = value; }
00077         }
00078         public DateTime ActEndDate
00079         {
00080             get {   return actEndDate;  }
00081             set {   actEndDate = value; }
00082         }
00083         #endregion
00084 
00089         public abstract string RenderHtml();
00090     }

00102             : base(id, name, description, startDate, expEndDate, actEndDate)
00103         {
00104             this.mgrID = mgrID;

00108             : this(-1, mgrID, name, description, startDate, DateTime.MinValue, DateTime.MinValue) {}
00109

00114         {

00116             set {   mgrID = value;  }
00117         }
00118

00120         {
00121             return "";
00122         }

00165     public enum TaskStatus { Unassigned=0, InProgress, Complete, Approved }
00166     public enum TaskComplexity { Low=0, Medium, High }
00167 
00171     public class Task : ProjectItem
00172     {
00173         private int devID;
00174         private int modID;
00175         private int projID;
00176         private TaskStatus status;
00177         private TaskComplexity complexity;
00178 
00179        public Task(int id, int modID, int projID, string name, string description, TaskComplexity complexity, 
00180             DateTime startDate, DateTime expEndDate, DateTime actEndDate)
00181             : base(id, name, description, startDate, expEndDate, actEndDate)
00182         {
00183             this.modID = modID;
00184             this.projID = projID;
00185             this.complexity = complexity;

00189             TaskComplexity complexity, DateTime startDate)

00191                 startDate, DateTime.MinValue, DateTime.MinValue) {}
